name: Rebuild and Defend!
description:
Game made for the jam GDevelop Jam 1 with the theme of Build/Rebuild

This is a multiplayer game where you and another player face off in a fight by building up your building during the build phase, and fighting during the fight phase. Then you have to rebuild and hope you can beat your opponent!

Controls

Left click to interact with buttons and place objects

Right click and move the mouse to move the camera.

Credits

User8426 - Coding

Toast Studio - Art

kifchris - Music / Sound
